# validateTag(_:)

**Type Method**

Checks to see whether a Virtio tag is valid.

## Declaration

```swift
class func validateTag(_ tag: String) throws
```

## Parameters

- **tag**: The tag to validate.

## Discussion

The tag can’t be empty and must be fewer than 36 bytes when encoded in UTF-8.
